Review_title: What a train wreck of a "documentary"
Review_Text: This is just a disgrace to the whole story.For one, it only deals with the time up to the "mini squeeze" in late January, so all the massive DD done by diligent apes are not part of this.Also, it's almost more like a documentary on how bad a place some of the shop employees felt GameStop was - and that was pre-Ryan Cohen.Sometimes it's good to be first, but by being first (with a documentary) in this case just resulted in a horrible mess.
